name: FCollectedStats
comment: Filtered and gathered stats we get during each frame

properties.name: RequiredMips
properties.comment: The size of the required mips pool

properties.name: TrianglesDrawn
properties.comment: The amount of triangles drawn this frame

name: IStatCollector
comment: Interface for stats collectors for our nightly stats gathering from maps

methods.name: StartCollection
methods.comment:
Called when we start collecting stats, make sure to reset all members here
@note Called on StatsThread

methods.name: StopCollection
methods.comment:
Called when we stop collecting stats
@note Called on StatsThread

methods.name: CollectData
methods.comment:
Called every frame whenever new stats has been gathered and filtered to a smaller subset
@note Called on StatsThread

methods.name: GetAndCreateOutputDirectory
methods.comment: Get the output directory where we dump our chart

methods.name: GetDesiredOutputFile
methods.comment: Get the filename of the stats file

methods.name: Tick
methods.comment: The the created worlds and update the render targets in them

methods.name: PostPIEStarted
methods.comment: For pigment map, we want stuff to be updated when opening maps

methods.name: DumpChart
methods.comment:
Dumps stats collection charts to disc
@note called on GameThread, called as a result of calling StopCollection

methods.name: HandleHiddenTextureStatsCommand
methods.comment: Dump more texture stats that doesn't show up in ListTextures

properties.name: HeightFogUpdater
properties.comment: Height fog properties that's controlled from camera

properties.name: StatCollectors
properties.comment: The current stats collectors, @note: Threadcontext StatsThread

properties.name: CollectStatsDelegateHandle
properties.comment: Handle for the delegate the function that get called every frame on the stats thread when collecting stats, @note: Threadcontext StatsThread

properties.name: mCollectStats
properties.comment: If true, then we are collecting stats
